did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Memoirs, speeches, decrees, proclamations, reports, and studies, relating to political conditions in Chile, administration of the Chilean government, and the transition from military to civilian rule in Chile, particularly during Fernández's service as minister of the interior.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Sergio Fernández papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1993.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Studied, Colegio Hispano Americano in Santiago
Minister of labor and social security

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The collection mainly relates to Sergio Fernández's role as the minister of the interior in Santiago, Chile from 1978 to 1982. It consists of interviews, speeches, notes, excerpts from books, and reports relating to political conditions in Chile, administration of the Chilean government, and the transition from military to civilian rule in Chile.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.

did.unittitle: "Transicion a la democracia." Related to the transition to democracy during the Pinochet era. Includes interviews, personal accounts, speeches, and analyses of the political status and shifting ideology in Chile at the time.
Chapter from Los Hombres de la Transicion by Andres Bello,

scopecontent.p: Fernández's diaries containing his speeches during his time as minister of the interior.
